pages.text: $(li)The Beacon is an important block that use the chaotic power of the Nether Star for you benefit.$(br)$(li)You must meet and specific requirements before be able to activate the Beacon.

$(li)First, Beacons require an unobstructed view of the sky. Transparent blocks like $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/glass)Glass$(/l) or water are allowed.$(br)$(li)The Beacon is on top of a pyramid constructed from $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/iron_block)Iron Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/gold_block)Gold Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/emerald_block)Emerald Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/diamond_block)Diamond Blocks$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/netherite_block)Netherite Blocks$(/l).$(br)$(li)The Beacon will emit a powerfull beam of light pointing towards the sky.$(br)This means the Beacon is activated.

$(li)You can change the beam light placing an specific Dyed Glass block on the top of the Beacon.$(br)$(li)Now you can right click on it to open a new GUI.$(br)$(li)Here you have to insert an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingot$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingot$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamond$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emerald$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/netherite_ingot)Netherite Ingot$(/l) and activate it.$(br)$(li)Finally choose the desire $(l)Primary$() and $(l)Secundary Power$().

$(li)The Primary and Secondary Powers that we can choose depends of the number of levels of the pyramid built for the Beacon.$(br)$(li)Level 1 - Primary Power Speed and Haste$(li)Level 2 - Primary Power Resistance and Jump Boost $(li) Level 3 - Primary Power Strength$(li)Level 4 - Secondary Power Regeneration
